name: Try to get information using an non-existent ID
scenarioId: pets/getPets:Try to get information using an non-existent ID
methodName: Try to get information using an non-existent ID

testSteps.description: 1: Try to get information using an non-existent ID ({id=-1})

children.description: Given That the user was able to send requests to the PetStore API.
When The user sends a get request using the pet id "-1".
User executes a GET on the resource pet/{id}
